issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.
resolution.name: Duplicate

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
This is a regression as the issue does not occur on 4.1.0.GA
Error shown on app launch on an iOS device < 9.0 version and when built using iOS sdk < 9.0

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Create a new titanium project using "appc new"
2. Run the project on iOS device < 9.0  using the command "appc run -p iOS -T device -I 8.4"
3. Launch the app upon install

Actual Result
On app launch the following error is shown
{code}
[ERROR] Script Error Couldn't find module: ti.cloud for architecture: armv7
{code}
fields.summary: Error during app launch when build using iOS sdk < 9.0 on iOS device < 9.0
fields.environment:
Mac OS: 10.10.4 
Ti SDK 4.2.0.v20150728205240
Appc NPM 4.1.0 
Appc CLI 4.2.0-1 
Ti CLI: 4.1.2 
Xcode 7 -beta4, Xcode 6.4
iPhone 6Plus (v8.3)

comments.body: Cannot ascertain the issue on iOS 9 device or when build with iOS 9 sdk as it is blocked by TIMOB-19268 and CLI-748
